attributes.review: I’ll be honest I was expecting so much more from an app of Don... Don.... tru.... sorry I can’t even say his name but i was expecting so much more so please if you want to download it it don’t because it will be a wast of your time and space and just leave a one star instead thank you for your time

attributes.title: not my baby daddy 😡
attributes.review: well you see i can’t read properly cuz i nev learned😪😭 so i downloaded this app to see my baby daddy aka obama 😸🥴💕💕 but when i opened the app i saw a 👹bright😪orange🤡wrinkled 🍊i got so scared i threw my IPHONE 11 pro macks down the stairs😔 then i realized that it said TRump 2020 instead of OBAma 2020😭i have to go to THEARAPY now😞 but it’s ok because my thearapist is hawt🥴

attributes.title: DOODOO WATER APP
attributes.review: As a wool carpet, to me this app is absolutely disgustingly horrifying. This app is beyond disgusting. When I opened the app the first thing I saw was a bright orange rapist and pedo. I am beyond words I can’t believe this why would someone make such an app I think it’s a good idea to take this app down it’s terrible I wouldn’t let my dog lay eyes on it absolutely disgusting.

attributes.title: I’m scared for my life 😞
attributes.review: I opened the app to see trump flashing his boobies. I’ve never been so scared. I have to go to therapy now! Because of him Cheetos make me nauseous and the color orange makes me want to rip out my eyes. Not only did he flash me he called me a cross eye Ed Sheeran. I don’t even know how he saw me. I cover my camera with tape and I’m scared to take selfies.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
each time i open the app it’s this weird looking cheeto guy every where i go !!! the app is disappointing it takes forever to load because cheeto guy takes too long to you know 💀 anywho DONT download this app it is so terrible and leaves you with nightmares every night !!!
Trump 2020✨🧚😍but on a gravestoneee😼🥰😘

attributes.title: A CLOWN🤡💩✨🙈🧚❤️
attributes.review: why would anyone make an app supporting a racist pig?😗 imagine children finding this app! don’t scar them for life! i wouldn’t want my kids looking at an orange, racist, fat, corn breaded haired pig! gen z will not go down without a fight! my sister has to go to therapy from watching the news (trump appeared in it) next time, WE NEED WARNINGS! so maybe instead of banning tiKtOK, ban rAcisTs✨🧚👄🙈

attributes.title: This app is a no.. it needs to be banned...
attributes.review: I strongly believe that this app is only for trump supporters. People who don’t want to support trump such as me, feel like there should be no reason as to why it’s in the App Store. It also is laggy and when I go in the app to see if it’s actually good it keeps force quitting on my phone. IT BELONGS IN THE TRASH.

attributes.title: Cheeto man Cheeto man 😡👊
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, I was just minding my own business till my goldfish started coughing out some orange clumps. I reached down to see what it was and realized it was trump’s hair. DON’T download this app unless you want endless clumps of hair. I had to throw the whole fish away. No the whole fish tank away. No the whole house away.

attributes.title: HORRIFYING
attributes.review: This app should not be in the appstore. I opened it and saw Donald trump.. naked! Worst sight. I think this should not be on the app star due to how sad and disgusting this is. I can’t believe donald trump would put his nudes on his own app. I was actually excited to open this too. I also thing it game my phone a virus because my phone is so so so sooo laggy!

attributes.title: #FREEBARRONTRUMP
attributes.review:
i opened this app and it completely glitched and closed down. my phone then powered off and the battery was completely drained. these problems are consistent only when the app is open. please remove this from the app store!!! do not download this video, it messes with your device!!! 

— the baddest barb.
